name: L'Oeil de Set
overview:
L'Oeil de Set is a French language text and graphics adventure game, developed and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 1987.
You evolve at the risk of your life, facing all kinds of mysterious creatures.

The secret passage closes. Here you are in the heart of the adventure. In the guise of the indwelling warrior Tyrkos, you must retrieve Fynsk's magic scepter from the lair of the necromancer Atrackses. Under each table the action is described in a few simple words. You have the choice between various solutions which you select using the keyboard, the best not always being the easiest! Difficult mission which then takes you from lava lakes in giant spider webs, from underground rivers to deep abysses ...

There are a great variety of places and characters. Through this maze of traps, the situation always seems new, and you will never feel like you are going in circles. It is only after a certain practice of the game that you will succeed in really entering this Inaccessible lair. Entirely in French, this role-playing game is attractive, even if it remains quite traditional. Lament the weak sound support of the game.
